full_text: well unfortunately gage consaleevs uh we talked about him a few weeks ago of mission did not make the cut but one bc player who could be on next year's canadian team is port moody's kent johnson he played for the trail smoke eaters and this year is with michigan university where he's already considered a top prospect for the 2021 draft especially when he scores highlight reel goals talent is accompanied by a voracious appetite to succeed he got to this point where we'd have to almost kick him off the ice because he would stay out there all day but you look at his talent the way he handles the puck you don't get to that level if you haven't spent hours on hours working at your craft tambellini's been an important mentor for johnson both are from port moody and when jeff took over his head coaching trail two years ago the first guy he recruited was johnson and tambellini made it clear right away he wasn't going to stifle any of that creativity and he really helped me develop and just let me make mistakes out there and i think that's huge for me you got to make mistakes to get better so i was never playing playing nervous or worried about making a mistake and i think that really helped my offensive game and johnson continues to flourish in the ncaa where he's fifth in the entire country in scoring with two goals and eight assists in his first 10 games he's entire draft and it's up to him to have a great finish this season but he's put himself in a very good position as of today yeah that guy's got some mad skills skills with a zed
